North Station Elevator 910 (Lobby to Forest Hills, Copley & West platform)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: To exit, exit the train at Haymarket and take an Orange Line Oak Grove-bound train or a Green Line North Station/Lechmere-bound train to North Station and use North Station Elevator 911. To board, use North Station Elevator to access the Oak Grove platform. Take an Oak Grove-bound train to Community College, then transfer to a Forest Hills-bound train. For customers seeking to board a Green Line Copley/Westbound train, exit at the North Station Forest Hills platform and proceed to the Copley and West platform.

properties.name: note
properties.value: Mini high level platform is available to provide level boarding to certain cars in a train set

attributes.description: North Station - Green Line - Copley & West
attributes.name: North Station

attributes.long_name: North Station Elevator 909 (Orange Line, Green Line lobby to Valenti Way)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: To exit, travel along the Green Line platform to the main lobby and use North Station Elevator 912 located on the unpaid side of the faregates. Alternatively, from the main lobby, proceeed up the passageway (to TD Garden) and use North Station Elevator 731. To board, travel north along Haverhill St towards Causeway St and use North Station Elevator 912 located at the corner of Haverhill St and Causeway St.

attributes.long_name: North Station Elevator 732 (Passageway to Commuter Rail, TD Garden)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: To exit, travel down the passageway and use North Station Elevator 731 to access Causeway St. To board, exit the main TD Garden entrance to Causeway St. At Causeway St, turn left and use North Station Elevator 731 to access the passageway.

properties.name: note
properties.value: City of Beverly is responsible for parking maintenance, payments, and snow removal.

attributes.long_name: North Station Elevator 912 (Orange Line, Green Line lobby to Causeway Street)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: To exit, proceed up the passageway (to TD Garden) and use North Station Elevator 731 to access Causeway St. Alternatively, pass through the fare gates and walk the full length of the Green Line platform to reach the opposite lobby at Valenti Way. At this lobby, use North Station Elevator 909 (lobby to Valenti Way) to reach the street level. To board, cross Causeway St and use North Station Elevator 731 to access the passageway and lobby. Alternatively, enter the main TD Garden entrance, turn right and use North Station Elevator 732 to access the passageway.

attributes.description: North Station - Causeway St (West), Nashua St
attributes.name: North Station - Causeway St (West), Nashua St

attributes.long_name: North Station Elevator 911 (Oak Grove platform to paid lobby)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: To exit, exit the train at Community College, then take a Forest Hills-bound train to North Station and use North Station Elevator 910. To board, use North Station Elevator 910 to access the Forest Hills platform, then take a Forest Hills-bound train to Haymarket. At Haymarket, proceed to the end of the platform and use Haymarket Elevator 905 to access the Orange Line underpass, then use Haymarket Elevator 907 to access the Oak Grove platform.

properties.name: note
properties.value: Full high level platform is available to provide level boarding to every car in a train set
